Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the betacoronaviruses spike protein family.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.35087243]Virus:SARS-CoV-2 Omicron:inhibition of cell-cell fusion in Calu-3 cells(IC50=119.68 nM);inhibition of cell-cell infusion in Caco2 cells(IC50=74.99 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=309.4 nM);inhibition of infection(Authentic)(IC50=1138 nM);SARS-CoV-2 Delta:inhibition of cell-cell fusion(IC50=131.8 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=427.55 nM);SARS-CoV-2 D614G:inhibition of cell-cell fusion(IC50=314.6 nM);inhibition of infection(Pseudovirus)(IC50=414.85 nM).[Ref.32231345]Virus:SARS-CoV:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=409.3 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in 293T/ACE2 cells(IC50=3237 nM);MERS-CoV:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=239.5 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=631.8 nM),inhibit the replication of MERS-CoV in VERO-E6 cells(IC50=802.1 nM);HCoV-OC43:ihibition of cell-cell fusion in Huh-7 fusion in Huh-7 cells(IC50=751.0 nM),inhibition of Pseudovirus (PsV) infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=7666 nM),inhibit the replication of HCoV-NL63 in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=3693 nM);CoV-WIV1:ihibition of Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide acted as a fusion inhibitor which against SARS-CoV-2 S protein-mediated membrane fusion and pseudovirus infection.

Literature.Title: Peptide-based pan-CoV fusion inhibitors maintain high potency against SARS-CoV-2 Omicron variant.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Chan JF, Wang L, Jiao F, Chik KK, Chu H, Lan Q, Xu W, Wang Q, Wang C, Yuen KY, Lu L, Jiang S.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 (previously 2019-nCoV) infection by a highly potent pan-coronavirus fusion inhibitor targeting its spike protein that harbors a high capacity to mediate membrane fusion.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Liu M, Wang C, Xu W, Lan Q, Feng S, Qi F, Bao L, Du L, Liu S, Qin C, Sun F, Shi Z, Zhu Y, Jiang S, Lu L.

Literature.Title: A pan-coronavirus fusion inhibitor targeting the HR1 domain of human coronavirus spike.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Yan L, Xu W, Agrawal AS, Algaissi A, Tseng CK, Wang Q, Du L, Tan W, Wilson IA, Jiang S, Yang B, Lu L.

Literature.Title: Fusion mechanism of 2019-nCoV and fusion inhibitors targeting HR1 domain in spike protein.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Zhu Y, Liu M, Lan Q, Xu W, Wu Y, Ying T, Liu S, Shi Z, Jiang S, Lu L.
